data.text:
Dieter Geissler (born January 18, 1939) is a German producer and actor who produced for The NeverEnding Story Trilogy.

Trivia[]

Geissler is the only producer to produce all three films in the Neverending Story trilogy.

He co-produced for The NeverEnding Story alongside Bernd Eichinger.

He produced for The NeverEnding Story II: The Next Chapter by himself.

He co-produced The NeverEnding Story III: Escape from Fantasia alongside an uncredited Heinz Bibo.
